comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
After a delay from the previous step, executes the given callback every tick until it succeeds.
Exceptions thrown within the callback will end sequence execution.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Tick (after the previous step in the GameTest sequence) to run the callback at.

comments.name: param
comments.value:
Testing callback function to execute.
Typically, this function will have .assertXyz functions within it.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns a GameTestSequence object where additional .thenXyz method steps can be added.
